name: Delicious Easy Chicken Francese
author: Elaina
summary: This is an easy and delicious recipe for Chicken Francese. It's great over pasta or rice or with a side of your favorite vegetable
ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
directions: Coat chicken with flour, then egg beat, then saute in a large skillet until almost cooked through
Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
In a medium saucepan combine the wine, broth, parsley, salt and pepper to taste, butter or margarine and lemon juice over medium low heat
When butter or margarine has melted, slowly stir in cornstarch until sauce thickens slightly
Place chicken in a 9x13 inch baking dish and pour sauce over all
Bake at 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) for about 10 to 15 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and juices run clear
